price: Be moderate in your gait and lower your voice. Indeed, the most repugnant of voices is the voice of donkeys.”
arabic: وَٱقۡصِدۡ فِي مَشۡيِكَ وَٱغۡضُضۡ مِن صَوۡتِكَۚ إِنَّ أَنكَرَ ٱلۡأَصۡوَٰتِ لَصَوۡتُ ٱلۡحَمِيرِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
